original_text: If I go forth into the field, then behold the slain with the sword! and if I enter into the city, then behold them that are sick with famine! yea, both the prophet and the priest go about into a land that they know not.
korean_text: 내가 들에 나간즉 칼에 죽은 자요 내가 성읍에 들어간즉 기근으로 병든 자며 선지자나 제사장이나 알지 못하는 땅으로 두루 다니도다

sentences.original_text: If I go forth into the field
then behold the slain with the sword!
and if I enter into the city
then behold them that are sick with famine!
yea, both the prophet and the priest
go about into a land that they know not.
